isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - Fuel Injector O-Rings and Seals

caution.para: All of the O-rings and seals on the fuel injector should be replaced anytime the fuel injector is removed. When removing or installing the O-rings and seals, be careful not to scratch the seal grooves of the fuel injector body. Use a non-metallic tool (wood or plastic) to cut the seals away from the grooves.

step1.para: Remove the copper gasket from the bottom of the fuel injector.
Lift the lower O-ring out of its groove. Cut the seal and remove it.
Lift the middle seal out of its groove. Cut the seal and remove it.
Lift the upper O-ring out of its groove. Cut the seal and remove it.
Lift the upper cushion ring out of its groove. Cut the seal and remove it.
Lift one corner of the backup ring from its groove. Slide the rest of the backup ring from its groove and over the tip of the fuel injector.
Make sure the fuel injector is clean and free of debris. Place the fuel injector into a holder rack where it will be protected from debris and damage.
